name: gamesConfiguration
title: Google Play Game Services Publishing API
description: The Publishing API for Google Play Game Services.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

schemas.name: LocalizedStringBundle
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a localized string bundle resource.

fields.name: translations
fields.desc: The locale strings.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesConfiguration#localizedStringBundle.

schemas.name: AchievementConfiguration
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for an achievement configuration resource.

fields.name: published
fields.desc: The read-only published data of the achievement.

fields.name: stepsToUnlock
fields.desc: Steps to unlock. Only applicable to incremental achievements.

fields.name: token
fields.desc: The token for this resource.

fields.name: achievementType
fields.desc:
The type of the achievement.
Possible values are:  
- "STANDARD" - Achievement is either locked or unlocked. 
- "INCREMENTAL" - Achievement is incremental.

fields.name: draft
fields.desc: The draft data of the achievement.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of the achievement.

fields.name: initialState
fields.desc:
The initial state of the achievement.
Possible values are:  
- "HIDDEN" - Achievement is hidden. 
- "REVEALED" - Achievement is revealed. 
- "UNLOCKED" - Achievement is unlocked.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesConfiguration#achievementConfiguration.

schemas.name: AchievementConfigurationDetail
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for an achievement configuration detail.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesConfiguration#achievementConfigurationDetail.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Localized strings for the achievement name.

fields.name: pointValue
fields.desc: Point value for the achievement.

fields.name: sortRank
fields.desc: The sort rank of this achievement. Writes to this field are ignored.

fields.name: description
fields.desc: Localized strings for the achievement description.

fields.name: iconUrl
fields.desc: The icon url of this achievement. Writes to this field are ignored.

schemas.name: GamesNumberAffixConfiguration
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a number affix resource.

fields.name: other
fields.desc: When the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity (as with all numbers in Chinese, or 42 in English).

fields.name: two
fields.desc: When the language requires special treatment of numbers like two (as with 2 in Welsh, or 102 in Slovenian).

fields.name: zero
fields.desc: When the language requires special treatment of the number 0 (as in Arabic).

fields.name: few
fields.desc: When the language requires special treatment of "small" numbers (as with 2, 3, and 4 in Czech; or numbers ending 2, 3, or 4 but not 12, 13, or 14 in Polish).

fields.name: many
fields.desc: When the language requires special treatment of "large" numbers (as with numbers ending 11-99 in Maltese).

fields.name: one
fields.desc: When the language requires special treatment of numbers like one (as with the number 1 in English and most other languages; in Russian, any number ending in 1 but not ending in 11 is in this class).

schemas.name: GamesNumberFormatConfiguration
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a number format resource.

fields.name: currencyCode
fields.desc: The curreny code string. Only used for CURRENCY format type.

fields.name: numDecimalPlaces
fields.desc: The number of decimal places for number. Only used for NUMERIC format type.

fields.name: numberFormatType
fields.desc:
The formatting for the number.
Possible values are:  
- "NUMERIC" - Numbers are formatted to have no digits or a fixed number of digits after the decimal point according to locale. An optional custom unit can be added.
- "TIME_DURATION" - Numbers are formatted to hours, minutes and seconds.
- "CURRENCY" - Numbers are formatted to currency according to locale.

fields.name: suffix
fields.desc: An optional suffix for the NUMERIC format type. These strings follow the same  plural rules as all Android string resources.

schemas.name: ImageConfiguration
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for an image configuration resource.

fields.name: imageType
fields.desc: The image type for the image.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesConfiguration#imageConfiguration.

fields.name: resourceId
fields.desc: The resource ID of resource which the image belongs to.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The url for this image.

schemas.name: LeaderboardConfiguration
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for an leaderboard configuration resource.

fields.name: draft
fields.desc: The draft data of the leaderboard.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The ID of the leaderboard.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesConfiguration#leaderboardConfiguration.

fields.name: published
fields.desc: The read-only published data of the leaderboard.

fields.name: scoreMax
fields.desc: Maximum score that can be posted to this leaderboard.

fields.name: scoreMin
fields.desc: Minimum score that can be posted to this leaderboard.

fields.name: scoreOrder
fields.desc:
The type of the leaderboard.
Possible values are:  
- "LARGER_IS_BETTER" - Larger scores posted are ranked higher. 
- "SMALLER_IS_BETTER" - Smaller scores posted are ranked higher.

fields.name: token
fields.desc: The token for this resource.

schemas.name: LeaderboardConfigurationDetail
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a leaderboard configuration detail.

fields.name: iconUrl
fields.desc: The icon url of this leaderboard. Writes to this field are ignored.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesConfiguration#leaderboardConfigurationDetail.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Localized strings for the leaderboard name.

fields.name: scoreFormat
fields.desc: The score formatting for the leaderboard.

fields.name: sortRank
fields.desc: The sort rank of this leaderboard. Writes to this field are ignored.

schemas.name: AchievementConfigurationListResponse
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a ListConfigurations response.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The achievement configurations.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string games#achievementConfigurationListResponse.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: The pagination token for the next page of results.

schemas.name: LeaderboardConfigurationListResponse
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a ListConfigurations response.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The leaderboard configurations.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string games#leaderboardConfigurationListResponse.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: The pagination token for the next page of results.

schemas.name: LocalizedString
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a localized string resource.

fields.name: locale
fields.desc: The locale string.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: The string value.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesConfiguration#localizedString.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Returns a list of the leaderboard configurations in this application.

pathParams.desc: The application ID from the Google Play developer console.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of resource configurations to return in the response, used for paging. For any response, the actual number of resources returned may be less than the specified maxResults.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: The token returned by the previous request.

methods.desc: Uploads an image for a resource with the given ID and image type.
